t: Amazon Just Added More Brands to Its Luxury Stores
s: July 23, 2021 - Viewed through a micro lens, it’s the latest bid to bring serious shoppers to Amazon. But through a macro one? Both the influx of brands and their accompanying announcement (the campaign theme is “Smile! It’s summer!”) are meant to shake any cobwebs that still cling to the idea of luxury.
